post.body: Don't feel bad...I sometimes have a problem remembering names but I hardly ever forget a face.
Thank you, kindly!
I couldn't resist...I agree, the pics are BEAUTIFUL...looks like you've been enjoying yourself :>). Thanks for sharing!
Happy New Year! Have a safe and magical time!
You can do it--I have faith in you!! If you need support, let me know :>).
"Bold adventure" is a good way to put it. I'm going to do what Susan Jeffers suggested..."feel the fear and do it anyway."
LOLOLOL
Yes, very cool! You got da gift, you gotta use it! :>). Twitter ROCKS!
LOL...I was a nobel, revered, Princess in another life..draped w/ precious jewels & adoring suitors. I want that back too!
Thanks, I LOVE hugs!! Smiles and hugs :>).
Per James Ray...his mentor told him...the only way to travel is in the front of a plane or the back of a car! I WANT THAT!
Awww, thanks!
Some days I wonder...as long as I can tweet, work & serve, I'm okay...gotta have some balance. All tweet & no work = no $$$.
Oh, that easy...I want a limousine with a driver & an alternate driver.
CONGRATS!!! You've earned it...I've heard nothing but good things about you. BTW, LOVE the new pic!
Sending you the BIGGEST cyber hug!!!! Thanks! Funny, we're all inspired by YOU!!
LOL..me too! I was stunned when I realized I was my own roadblock..that reminds me of Marcia Rosen's book--awesome!
Hi Wendy! I sure do...does this mean I have "tweet-itis"?
Synchronicity...tell him I'm available for an interview or quotes if he needs help :>).
Starting to itch...haven't had my dose of CNN today...tuning in now...
